events.message: I received my order last week, but unfortunately I want to request a refund because the product does not match what was advertised.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning a refund and dissatisfaction.
The customer service agent specialized in refund cases has been assigned to handle this request for faster resolution.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request and make sure we resolve this promptly.
Could you please provide your order number and details about why the product did not meet your expectations? This will help us process your refund quickly.
My order number is 123456789. The product I received is completely different from the description and pictures on your website.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund immediately and provide you with instructions to return the product at no cost to you.
I appreciate the quick response and the offer for a full refund. I will follow the return instructions as soon as I receive them.
Your refund has been processed and return shipping label sent to your email. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are following up to confirm that you received the refund and if everything is satisfactory with your case resolution.
As no further requests were received, we are closing your case. Thank you for your patience and please contact us anytime for support.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our refund process. Your feedback helps us improve.
